content: materials worsted weight yarn in the colors of your choice 3 25 or 3 75mm crochet hook fiber fill scissors yarn needle pins stitch markers small amount of black embroidery thread optional black felt abbreviations chain- chain single_crochet- single_crochet increase- increase decrease- decrease magic_ring- magic_ring st- stitch slip_stitch- slip_stitch flo- front loops only bobble st- 5 loop bobble stitch half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet tc- triple crochet
